response.overview: This comprehensive documentary on Yiddish comedy duo Shimon Dzigan and Israel Shumacher combines their biographies with a look at the changing status of Yiddish culture in Israel. Featuring rare footage, film clips, and recreations of their Polish and Israeli performances, along with interviews from Shumacherâ€™s daughter and writers, actors and comedians like Hana Laszlo and Mike Burstyn.
response.title: It Sounds Better In Yiddish
